ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: In this special issue of G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero, G.I. JOE goes to SAN DIEGO COMIC-CON INTERNATIONAL! After being provided with pivotal information, G.I. JOE travel to San Diego in order to stop a plot to exchange nuclear clearance codes within the confines of the SDCC. Will G.I. JOE save the day in time? You canâ€™t miss this convention-tastic issue of G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero!
